title: Remove admin access restrictions â€” open admin panel to all authenticated users

requirements.text: In `backend/main.mo`, remove all principal-based access control from `getPendingVerifications()` and `approveUTR()`. Both methods must be callable by any authenticated user without any admin principal check. Remove or disable the `initAdmin()` method's principal-storage logic so it no longer gates access. Remove any stored admin principal state and all access-denied guard clauses from these two methods.

quotes: removing all admin access restrictions so everyone can access the `/admin` panel without any principal check

acceptanceCriteria: `getPendingVerifications()` returns pending UTR submissions when called by any authenticated principal (not just a stored admin).
`approveUTR(targetPrincipal)` successfully approves a UTR when called by any authenticated principal.
No 'access denied' or 'unauthorized' error is returned from either method for any authenticated caller.
`initAdmin()` no longer stores or enforces an admin principal (can be a no-op or removed).

requirements.text: In `frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx`, remove the `initAdmin()` call on mount and remove the 'Access denied. Admin only.' error display logic. The component should proceed directly to calling `getPendingVerifications()` on mount and display the results. Any conditional rendering tied to an access-denied state must be removed.
acceptanceCriteria: AdminPanel.tsx no longer calls `initAdmin()` on mount.
AdminPanel.tsx no longer renders an 'Access denied. Admin only.' message under any condition.
On mount, the component immediately fetches and displays pending UTR verifications.
The Approve button on each row calls `approveUTR(targetPrincipal)` and removes the approved row from the list on success.

constraints: Do not change the visual design or layout of AdminPanel.tsx beyond removing the access-denied gate.
Do not alter any other backend methods or data structures beyond the admin access control logic.
nonGoals: Adding any new authentication mechanism or replacing Internet Identity.
Changing the UTR submission or approval data model.
Modifying any tab other than the admin panel.
